subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Rangers worked hard to keep Alex Ovechkin from scoring, but the third-line center Jay Beagle banked in a shot to give Washington a 2-1 series lead.
snippet: The Rangers worked hard to keep Alex Ovechkin from scoring, but the third-line center Jay Beagle banked in a shot to give Washington a 2-1 series lead.
